com.pace.jayvee.image.worker

Class ImageTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pace.jayvee.image.worker.ImageTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Worker
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ToGrayscale

    public abstract class ImageTransformer
extends Object
implements Worker
    An image transformer modifies an existing image an turns it into a new image of the same width and height (but not necessarily the same # of bands). Common image transformers are things like convolution, color space conversion, edge detection, etc. This basic image transformer creates a brand new image in memory and then relies on a subclass to do the actual transformation. Some subclasses may choose to modify the image in place.

    • Field Detail

      • inputImages

        public Source<Image> inputImages
        The images that will be transformed by the transformer. There is no requirement on the structure or form of these images. Subclasses should inspect the images to make sure they are valid.

      • outputImages

        public Sink<Image> outputImages
        The transformed images.
